ygData.subject: Re: Kelin's Lament
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Correct me if I m wrong, but I do believe Kelethin is where you purchase that song...and yes it is a long ways for MOST classes to travel, BUT we are
ygData.messageBody:
>From: blmurphy@...
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Kelin's Lament
>Date: 13 May 1999 13:07:40 -0000
>
>From: blmurphy@...
>
>Hail Fellow Bards!
>
>Is it possible to obtain Kelin's Lugubrious Lament in a city other than
>Kelethin? It is a long way from Qeynos, my hometown!
>
>Thanks!
>
>Boru, Bard of Qeynos, Innoruuk
>

Correct me if I'm wrong, but I do believe Kelethin is where you purchase
that song...and yes it is a long ways for MOST classes to travel, BUT we are
bards! If you know the route, it takes only about 30 min to travel from
Qeynos to Freeport using Accelerando with a drum...the longest part when
going to Kelethin is usually the boat ride to Faydwer (waiting for it).

I used to run back and forth from Freeport to Qeynos all the time (for many
different reasons)...sometimes I'd go to Qeynos and return to Freeport the
same day. Accelerando ROCKS!

Sartori of Kelethin
